DOC.brief_summary: Test safety efficacy novel IL-13 AB treatment perianal fistula - Trial medicinal product
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Anti-IL-13 Monoclonal Antibody QAX576 Treatment Perinanal Fistulas Patients Suffering From Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : diagnosis Crohn 's disease > 6 month fistula least 1 ineffective fistula treatment past Exclusion criterion : TNF antibody treatment fail past plan surgery
